name: Ninja Attack (itch)
description:
07/14/2016 - New Build with lots of bug fixes and game play tweaks. Game B is now implemented and fixed some issues with using a game controller.

07/20/2016 - Fixed a small bug lingering with controller detection. Updated the game play mechanics to increase difficulty more quickly.

07/24/2016 - Added death sounds for player and enemy. Added pause at end of game before resetting to clock. Modified the enemy spawn system. Fixed a bug with the game A and game B buttons and start.

08/05/2016 - Added in HOw to Play Screen at Boot. Also you can hit or B Button on the controller to bring up the control menu. More bug fixes - Issue with throw not working when playing a second game and starting a second game.
